Classes/WinguFile.html#/s:17winguSDKEsse.name: name
Classes/WinguFile.html#/s:17winguSDKEsse.abstract: Name of the file, configured in wingu portal.

Classes/WinguFile.html#/s:17winguSDKEsse.name: download(_:)
Classes/WinguFile.html#/s:17winguSDKEsse.abstract: Use this clousure function to download WinguFile. The data will be retured as plain Data object.

Classes/SeenChannels.html#/s:17winguSDKE.name: append(_:)
Classes/SeenChannels.html#/s:17winguSDKE.abstract: Append seen channel. Visit WinguLocationsDelegate for more information what unseen can mean.

Classes/Boundary/BoundaryType.html.name: BoundaryType
Classes/Boundary/BoundaryType.html.abstract: Represents boundary type of collection of coordinates.

Classes/Boundary.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.name: type
Classes/Boundary.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.abstract: Type of Boundaries. Check BoundaryType enum to learn more.

Classes/Boundary.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.name: coordinates
Classes/Boundary.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.abstract: Collection of coordinates in order. Whenever this value will be set centerCoordinate variable also needs to be refreshed.

Classes/Barcode/BarcodeType.html#/s:17wi.name: ean13
Classes/Barcode/BarcodeType.html#/s:17wi.abstract: Default barcode type. To learn more about EAN-13 visit: http://www.barcodeisland.com/ean13.phtml

Classes/Barcode.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: type
Classes/Barcode.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Type of barcode. See Barcode.BarcodeType for available cases.

Classes/Address.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: formattedAddress
Classes/Address.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: String containig formatted address directly to display.

Classes/Address.html.name: Address
Classes/Address.html.abstract: Contain informations about address in readable format. Usually associated with Location object.

Classes/Barcode.html.name: Barcode
Classes/Barcode.html.abstract: Typically associated with CouponComponent object. Represent barcode that can be scanned using other readers.

Classes/Boundary.html.name: Boundary
Classes/Boundary.html.abstract: Associated with Geofence. Contains values that descibe specyfic area created in wingu portal.

Classes/Location.html.name: Location
Classes/Location.html.abstract: Location of the channel. Usually connected to Channel object and depends of channel type (Geofence, Beacon…). Please note that any of this fields can be nil.

Classes/PackLocale.html.name: PackLocale
Classes/PackLocale.html.abstract: Usually associated with a Deck and contains information about language of the Deck.

Classes/SeenChannels.html.name: SeenChannels
Classes/SeenChannels.html.abstract: Channels that already has been visited. Works in companion to delegate method that returns only unseen channels in WinguLocationsDelegate

Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.name: getMenuItems(with:completion:)
Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.abstract: Get MenuItem collection. Fetches MenuItems available on wingu portal.

Classes/MenuItem.html.name: MenuItem
Classes/MenuItem.html.abstract: Contains information about menu item and assigned content. This is a representation of an object created in wingu portal.

Classes/ContentOfMenuItem.html.name: ContentOfMenuItem
Classes/ContentOfMenuItem.html.abstract: This is a representation of menu item content.

Classes/WinguImage.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: caption
Classes/WinguImage.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Caption of the picture, configurable in wingu portal.

Classes/WinguImage.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: image
Classes/WinguImage.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Indication of image that will be presented or fetched.

Classes/Image.html#/s:17winguSDKEssentia.name: metadata
Classes/Image.html#/s:17winguSDKEssentia.abstract: metadata of not yet downloaded image. Can tell dimension and positioning before download.

Classes/Image.html#/s:17winguSDKEssentia.name: url(for:configuration:)
Classes/Image.html#/s:17winguSDKEssentia.abstract: Create URL from width of the picture. Measured in points (not pixels)

Classes/Image.html#/s:17winguSDKEssentia.name: download(_:_:)
Classes/Image.html#/s:17winguSDKEssentia.abstract: Download image from URL passed with expected with, Should be match with method url(for:) to get right URL for size of the UIImageView

Classes/WinguImage.html.name: WinguImage
Classes/WinguImage.html.abstract: Wrap Image object to provide necessery information about picture before start download.

Classes/ContactComponentAddress.html#/s:.name: streetNumber
Classes/ContactComponentAddress.html#/s:.abstract: Street number as a String. Please note that it may not contain only numbers (ex. 24A/9)

Classes/ContactComponentAddress.html.name: ContactComponentAddress
Classes/ContactComponentAddress.html.abstract: Contain detail information about address split into different field

Classes/ContactSocialMedia.html.name: ContactSocialMedia
Classes/ContactSocialMedia.html.abstract: Social Media references. In Contacts apps there are facebook, twitter and yelp already natively supported. Google + will be transfered to plain texts or skipped, since there is no support for it in OS level.

Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.name: isPersistent
Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.abstract: Is field is persistent (can hold values between sessions)

Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.name: formType
Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.abstract: Form input type. Could be nil if form element is set to select

Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.name: isMultiselect
Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.abstract: Is multiselection possible. Could be nil if this element is not select type of field

Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.name: answer
Classes/FormElement.html#/s:17winguSDKEs.abstract: Answer for element in current session. It’s managed by class

Classes/FormAnswer.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: displayable()
Classes/FormAnswer.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Elements to display on list, especially in use with persistancy

Classes/FormSelectOption.html.name: FormSelectOption
Classes/FormSelectOption.html.abstract: Form select options. Only valid with selections

Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: position
Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Since AudioMedia are strongly connected to AudioPlaylistComponent this parameters define position inside playlist.

Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: name
Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Name of the track defines in wingu portal

Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: album
Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Album fetched from mp3 tags, you cannot change it in the portal, modify mp3 tags and reupload to wingu portal if any changes of this are required

Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.name: fileURL
Classes/AudioMedia.html#/s:17winguSDKEss.abstract: Plain URL value of reference mp3 file

Classes/AudioAlbum.html.name: AudioAlbum
Classes/AudioAlbum.html.abstract: Contains information about album that is associated with mp3 file imported to wingu portal.

Classes/AlignmentImage.html.name: AlignmentImage
Classes/AlignmentImage.html.abstract: Contains information about image and it’s alignment.

Structs/Logger/LoggingLevel.html#/s:17wi.name: detailed
Structs/Logger/LoggingLevel.html#/s:17wi.abstract: more detailed logs, contains informations, warnings and errors

Structs/Logger.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: loggingLevel
Structs/Logger.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: How detailed logs should be - development only purposes.

Structs/Logger.html.name: Logger
Structs/Logger.html.abstract: Logging events from wingu SDK. Only for development purposes, will be moved somewhere else in future releases without backwards compability.

Enums/FormComponentError.html#/s:17wingu.name: noElementsToSubmit
Enums/FormComponentError.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: No elements too submit was found, aborting…

Enums/FormComponentError.html#/s:17wingu.name: requiredElementsNotFilled(element:)
Enums/FormComponentError.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: Requirements has not been filled. This usually means all required fields was not filled. element is the first element for this error.

Enums/FormComponentError.html.name: FormComponentError
Enums/FormComponentError.html.abstract: Errors can occurs while submitting form component.

Extensions/RediscoverNotificationTime.ht.name: none
Extensions/RediscoverNotificationTime.ht.abstract: None, notification will always be triggered in case of enter the area

Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: BeaconFetchDataTime
Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Offset for data caching when find a new beacon. You should keep caching as high as possible to prevent battery and network draining.

Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: BeaconLostTime
Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Offset for beacons ranging that will prevent beacons on the edge of discovery to get discovered and lost again

Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: GeofenceAccuracyOffset
Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Increase horizontal accuracy of GPS, you should never extend max value. The range is between 0 and 10k meters. Measured in meters.

Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: GeofenceLostTime
Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Offset for beacons ranging that will prevent geofences on the edge of discovery to get discovered and lost again

Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: RediscoverNotificationTime
Type Aliases.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Offset for notification. If user rediscover this beacon from this time since last notification no notification will be send. Default is 1 hour (.hourly)

Classes/PredefinedActions/Option.html.name: Option
Classes/PredefinedActions/Option.html.abstract: Option for notifications. Have a look at UNNotificationActionOptions at apple documentation.

Classes/PredefinedActions.html#/s:17wing.name: init(identifier:title:option:authenticationRequired:)
Classes/PredefinedActions.html#/s:17wing.abstract: Default initializer. All parameters are required to create UNNotificationAction.

Protocols/NotificationManagerProtocol.ht.name: setupDelegate(_:)
Protocols/NotificationManagerProtocol.ht.abstract: Set delegate to notification class through this method

Protocols/NotificationManagerProtocol.ht.name: addRequest(_:completion:)
Protocols/NotificationManagerProtocol.ht.abstract: Adding request to class that conforms to NotificationManagerProtocol protocol

Classes/NotificationsManager.html#/s:17w.name: shouldSendWinguNotifications
Classes/NotificationsManager.html#/s:17w.abstract: It indicates whenever application is in background state to trigger notification with trigger details and content

Classes/NotificationsManager.html#/s:17w.name: requestNotificationsPermission(configuration:_:)
Classes/NotificationsManager.html#/s:17w.abstract: Request notification permission for the end-user. It’s required to add this method to your project in order to receive Push Notification.

Classes/NotificationsManager.html#/s:17w.name: notificationsPermission(settings:delegate:completion:)
Classes/NotificationsManager.html#/s:17w.abstract: If app that it’s integrating winguSDK already supports notification (local or push), you may need more detailed configuration. If completion clousure are not required and default settings are sufficient there should be called NotificationsManager.requestNotificationsPermission() instead.

Classes/NotificationsManager.html.name: NotificationsManager
Classes/NotificationsManager.html.abstract: Allows you to receive Notifications through wingu platform.

Extensions/UNNotificationAction.html.name: UNNotificationAction
Extensions/UNNotificationAction.html.abstract: Extend UNNotificationAction actions for wingu predefined Actions.

Protocols/NotificationManagerProtocol.ht.name: NotificationManagerProtocol
Protocols/NotificationManagerProtocol.ht.abstract: Protocol for managing notifications for all supported iOS versions.

Classes/Interaction.html.name: Interaction
Classes/Interaction.html.abstract: As a part of analytics interaction is a representation of single event happen in Channel or Content.

Classes/Component.html#/s:17winguSDKEsse.name: discriminator
Classes/Component.html#/s:17winguSDKEsse.abstract: Human readable name of the component before parsing to matching subclass. In case of occurrence basic Component class, that value should be check to know what data it’s inside payload.

Classes/Card.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: component
Classes/Card.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Component object. There will be rarely situation that this will be plain Component class.

Classes/Deck.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: title
Classes/Deck.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Can be used as a header or notification title. It is configurable in wingu portal with available localization options.

Classes/Deck.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: cards
Classes/Deck.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: List of cards available for this deck

Classes/Pack.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.name: locale
Classes/Pack.html#/s:17winguSDKEssential.abstract: Contains informations about available languages. You can get other languages with direct API call.

Classes/Content.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: packLocales
Classes/Content.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Collection of PackLocales available to this content

Classes/Content.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: pack
Classes/Content.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Single pack pre-selected in request level to match device language.

Classes/Content.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: lastChange
Classes/Content.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Last change of Content in wingu portal

Classes/Beacon/InRangeType.html#/s:17win.name: withoutContent
Classes/Beacon/InRangeType.html#/s:17win.abstract: beacon is in range but does not have any content attached

Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: uuid
Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: UUID of physical device. See CLBeacon documentation @ Apple.com to learn more.

Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: major
Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: major of physical device. See CLBeacon documentation @ Apple.com to learn more.

Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: minor
Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: major of physical device. See CLBeacon documentation @ Apple.com to learn more.

Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: proximity
Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: proximity of physical device. See CLBeacon documentation @ Apple.com to learn more.

Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: accuracy
Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: accuracy of physical device. See CLBeacon documentation @ Apple.com to learn more.

Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.name: rssi
Classes/Beacon.html#/s:17winguSDKEssenti.abstract: rssi of physical device. See CLBeacon documentation @ Apple.com to learn more.

Classes/Geofence.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.name: boundaries
Classes/Geofence.html#/s:17winguSDKEssen.abstract: boundaries of the geofence. In case of shape different than circle it will be redrawn to make circle with the same surface area and central point.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: name
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Name of the Channel. This shouldn’t be confused with Deck.name.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: content
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Depends on trigger and SDK configuration this may not exist in case of trigger discovery. Avoid forcing.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: location
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Location of channel depends of trigger. Some of the triggers are without location or location may be outdated.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: notifiedDate
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: For custom notification system for wingu channels this property can be overriden with current date to send notifications with custom delays.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: stopViewing()
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Calling this method will end Interaction of .view type.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: stopDwelling()
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Calling this method will end Interaction of .dwell type.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: update(configuration:_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Update channel content by forcing manual update.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.name: seen()
Classes/Channel.html#/s:17winguSDKEssent.abstract: Mark channel as seen. It will not be reflected in public properties at channel level.

Classes/Channel.html.name: Channel
Classes/Channel.html.abstract: Base representation of some wingu trigger configured in portal. All detailed triggers like Geofence or Beacon will inherit from this class.

Classes/Geofence.html.name: Geofence
Classes/Geofence.html.abstract: Representation of geofence area from wingu portal, Configurable in wingu portal contains usually already prepared content, without extra fetches (like in a case of iBeacon).

Classes/Beacon.html.name: Beacon
Classes/Beacon.html.abstract: Representation of CoreLocation class CLBeacon with extra arguments from wingu portal.

Classes/Content.html.name: Content
Classes/Content.html.abstract: Contains informations about components configured in wingu portal and languages that it’s available.

Classes/Deck.html.name: Deck
Classes/Deck.html.abstract: Contains information about all components and cards. This is a representation of an object created in wingu portal. This is already localized to match device selected language.

Classes/Component.html.name: Component
Classes/Component.html.abstract: Component is a base class for all elements configurable inside wingu portal. It represents single object created inside your content.

Classes/WebhookComponent.html#/s:17wingu.name: buttonCaption
Classes/WebhookComponent.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: Call to action message. Usually display on the button.

Classes/WebhookComponent.html#/s:17wingu.name: trigger(with:_:)
Classes/WebhookComponent.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: This method should not be called manually in case you don’t override whole component.

Classes/VideoComponent.html#/s:17winguSD.name: payload
Classes/VideoComponent.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Payload depends on type, with VideoComponent.VideoType.youtube is an URL to youtube video, not validated.

Classes/SurveyMonkeyComponent.html#/s:17.name: surveyURL
Classes/SurveyMonkeyComponent.html#/s:17.abstract: URL to the survey placed in wingu portal, not validated.

Classes/RatingComponent.html#/s:17winguS.name: post(info:value:configuration:)
Classes/RatingComponent.html#/s:17winguS.abstract: Post rating with value. All parameters should be passed to make analytics work

Classes/GalleryComponent.html#/s:17wingu.name: images
Classes/GalleryComponent.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: Collection of images. Resources are not downloaded yet.

Classes/FormComponent.html#/s:17winguSDK.name: submitted
Classes/FormComponent.html#/s:17winguSDK.abstract: Date of submission form last time. If nil form was never have been submitted.

Classes/FormComponent.html#/s:17winguSDK.name: submit(configuration:completion:)
Classes/FormComponent.html#/s:17winguSDK.abstract: Submit form component. Call can throw an issues from FormComponentError enum.

Classes/FileComponent.html#/s:17winguSDK.name: files
Classes/FileComponent.html#/s:17winguSDK.abstract: Collection of files with additional informations. Resources is not downloaded just yet.

Classes/CouponComponent.html#/s:17winguS.name: barcode
Classes/CouponComponent.html#/s:17winguS.abstract: Barcode representation. This will not contain generated barcode just yet.

Classes/CouponComponent.html#/s:17winguS.name: disclaimer
Classes/CouponComponent.html#/s:17winguS.abstract: Dosclaimer message, usually legal note or expiration date.

Classes/ContactComponent.html#/s:17wingu.name: extraInfo
Classes/ContactComponent.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: Additional information don’t feed in any other field. Since iOS nativly not support Google+ in Contact app, whenever there is Google+ filled and stored in Contacts app extra information in the end will be populated with Google+ link also.

Classes/ContactComponent.html#/s:17wingu.name: website
Classes/ContactComponent.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: Website plain url, by default it will always be with SSL if website does not support https links it’s need to be added in wingu portal that way.

Classes/ContactComponent.html#/s:17wingu.name: address
Classes/ContactComponent.html#/s:17wingu.abstract: Address, diffrent that Address! It contain more separate fields, to help locate the place using Maps app.

Classes/CMSComponent/CMSType.html#/s:17w.name: markdown
Classes/CMSComponent/CMSType.html#/s:17w.abstract: markdown type of object. All markdown tags are supported.

Classes/CMSComponent/CMSType.html#/s:17w.name: html
Classes/CMSComponent/CMSType.html#/s:17w.abstract: html type. This will be rather simple htmls tag build in wingu portal editor.

Classes/CMSComponent/CMSType.html.name: CMSType
Classes/CMSComponent/CMSType.html.abstract: Represents type of text component returns from wingu portal.

Classes/BrandBarComponent.html#/s:17wing.name: background
Classes/BrandBarComponent.html#/s:17wing.abstract: Background of Brand bar component configurated in wingu portal.

Classes/AudioPlaylistComponent.html#/s:1.name: media
Classes/AudioPlaylistComponent.html#/s:1.abstract: Media collection, sorted by default, but use AudioMedia.position argument to change arrangement.

Classes/ActionComponent/ActionType.html#.name: openUrl
Classes/ActionComponent/ActionType.html#.abstract: Opens action define in wingu portal in Safari (default iOS browser)

Classes/ActionComponent.html#/s:17winguS.name: type
Classes/ActionComponent.html#/s:17winguS.abstract: Define a type used later for perform action. Usually this will be opening url in Safari.

Classes/ActionComponent.html#/s:17winguS.name: caption
Classes/ActionComponent.html#/s:17winguS.abstract: Text displayed on the button inside action component. In this example it’s Action Component

Classes/ActionComponent.html#/s:17winguS.name: payload
Classes/ActionComponent.html#/s:17winguS.abstract:
Payload contains all information needed to open website or perform other actions.
By default for opening website in Safari it will contain redirection URL. It’s highly recommended to use https in links in wingu portal. If that is not possible apps need too support NSAllowsArbitraryLoads in NSAppTransportSecurity inside your Info.plist file. This is not something that can be always catch in debugger!

Classes/ActionComponent/ActionType.html.name: ActionType
Classes/ActionComponent/ActionType.html.abstract: Action Type define what should be done after user interaction

Classes/ActionComponent.html.name: ActionComponent
Classes/ActionComponent.html.abstract: Action Component is element that trigger redirection from the deck. Currently support types are listed under ActionComponent.ActionType section

Classes/AudioPlaylistComponent.html.name: AudioPlaylistComponent
Classes/AudioPlaylistComponent.html.abstract: Match Audio Component configurable in wingu portal.

Classes/BrandBarComponent.html.name: BrandBarComponent
Classes/BrandBarComponent.html.abstract: BrandBarComponent is a representation of Brand bar created in wingu portal.

Classes/CMSComponent.html.name: CMSComponent
Classes/CMSComponent.html.abstract: CMSComponent is a representation of Markdown or HTML component created in wingu portal.

Classes/ContactComponent.html.name: ContactComponent
Classes/ContactComponent.html.abstract: It is a representation of info card in wingu portal. It may look like this:

Classes/CouponComponent.html.name: CouponComponent
Classes/CouponComponent.html.abstract: CouponComponent works with Barcode to provide reach experience. It may look like this:

Classes/FileComponent.html.name: FileComponent
Classes/FileComponent.html.abstract: Collection of files added in wingu portal.

Classes/FormComponent.html.name: FormComponent
Classes/FormComponent.html.abstract: Form/Survey component. Representation of component with a same name in wingu portal

Classes/GalleryComponent.html.name: GalleryComponent
Classes/GalleryComponent.html.abstract: Gallery Component contain both single images inline in text and multiple pictures.

Classes/LocationComponent.html.name: LocationComponent
Classes/LocationComponent.html.abstract: Location Component is a representation of wingu portal Map.

Classes/SeparatorComponent.html.name: SeparatorComponent
Classes/SeparatorComponent.html.abstract: Representation of separator components in wingu portal.

Classes/SurveyMonkeyComponent.html.name: SurveyMonkeyComponent
Classes/SurveyMonkeyComponent.html.abstract: Survey Monkey component redirect to form of the survey. This is representation of component with a same name in wingu portal.

Classes/VideoComponent.html.name: VideoComponent
Classes/VideoComponent.html.abstract: Video component is a representation of component from wingu portal.

Classes/WebhookComponent.html.name: WebhookComponent
Classes/WebhookComponent.html.abstract: Component that trigger third party action from connected website configured in wingu portal

Structs/WinguConfiguration/Beacons.html#.name: lostOffset
Structs/WinguConfiguration/Beacons.html#.abstract: Property that prevent your beacons on the edge of discovery to jump back to lost state.

Structs/WinguConfiguration/Notifications.name: onlyNotificationsWithContentUpdate
Structs/WinguConfiguration/Notifications.abstract: User will get notification only whenever is content update from previous time notification was shown.

Structs/WinguConfiguration/Notifications.name: rediscoverNotificationTime
Structs/WinguConfiguration/Notifications.abstract: Time offset for notification. Whenever end-user rediscover the same beacon this will be check against last stored beacon. If passed more than time defined here it will send notification.

Structs/WinguConfiguration/Geofences.htm.name: accuracyOffset
Structs/WinguConfiguration/Geofences.htm.abstract: Accuracy of geofence apply only in foreground. It add some extra offset to user location to extend slighly the range.

Structs/WinguConfiguration/Geofences.htm.name: lostOffset
Structs/WinguConfiguration/Geofences.htm.abstract: Property that prevent your geofences on the edge of discovery to jump back to not discovered state.

Structs/WinguConfiguration/Analytics.htm.name: shouldStopCollectingAutomaticData
Structs/WinguConfiguration/Analytics.htm.abstract: Should app collect analytics data for wingu portal.

Structs/WinguConfiguration.html#/s:17win.name: returnOnlyChanelsWithContent
Structs/WinguConfiguration.html#/s:17win.abstract: By default winguSDK returns every channels found matching wingu criteria.

Structs/WinguConfiguration.html#/s:17win.name: apiKey
Structs/WinguConfiguration.html#/s:17win.abstract: Your API Key. To obtain your API key please visit wingu.de

Structs/WinguConfiguration.html#/s:17win.name: defaultConfiguration
Structs/WinguConfiguration.html#/s:17win.abstract: Default configuration. It contains geofences on the area near Union Square in San Francisco, California.

Structs/WinguConfiguration.html.name: WinguConfiguration
Structs/WinguConfiguration.html.abstract: Sets of configuration that can be used to customize behaviour of wingu SDK.

Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.name: authorizationStatus(_:)
Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Authorization status gives you informations about current state of authorizationStatus.

Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.name: winguChannels(_:)
Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Returns always whole list of regions in range

Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.name: updatedContent(_:)
Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.abstract: You should reload view attached to beacon with this channel. Object will be always the same as in winguChannels(:) method and this method will always be called after callback from winguChannels(:).

Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.name: updatePhysicalInfo(_:)
Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Whenever physical object change parameters this will return complete channel object with all updated parameters.

Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.name: updatePhysical()
Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Some of the channels did change physical characteristics

Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.name: winguUnseenChannels(_:)
Protocols/WinguLocationsDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Unseen collection of channels. If the end user never display content this will return collection of unseen, available regions in the area.

Classes/BeaconScanner/MonitoringState.ht.name: sameAsRanging
Classes/BeaconScanner/MonitoringState.ht.abstract: sameAsRanging: SDK will monitor for the same CLBeaconRegion as ranging

Classes/BeaconScanner/ScanningState.html.name: rangingAndMonitoring
Classes/BeaconScanner/ScanningState.html.abstract: In case for both ranging and monitoring beacons.

Classes/BeaconScanner/ScanningState.html.name: idle
Classes/BeaconScanner/ScanningState.html.abstract: Ready to use. Not action performed yet.

Classes/BeaconScanner.html#/s:17winguSDK.name: shouldMonitorForBeaconsInBackground
Classes/BeaconScanner.html#/s:17winguSDK.abstract: Property that indicates if you should monitor for beacons in background. Default is .sameAsRanging.

Classes/BeaconScanner/ScanningState.html.name: ScanningState
Classes/BeaconScanner/ScanningState.html.abstract: Scanning state of BeaconScanner. To get familiar with ranging and monitoring concept please visit Official Apple documentation that cover this topic.

Classes/BeaconScanner/MonitoringState.ht.name: MonitoringState
Classes/BeaconScanner/MonitoringState.ht.abstract: State of monitoring. Defined in a variable shouldMonitorForBeaconsInBackground

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: beaconScanner
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Instance of BeaconScanner. You can change scanning parameters using this property, but property itself is

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: geofenceScanner
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Instance of GeofenceScanner. You can change scanning parameters using this property, but property itself is

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: init(configuration:)
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Main initializer. WinguLocation should always has configuration applied. If not default configuration will be in use.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: delegate
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: WinguLocationManagerDelegate is needed to be set if you want to receive callbacks. More in protocol description available methods

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: channels
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Channel collection that is in range in this moment.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: requestPermission(_:)
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Request location permission. Call it before start ranging or monitoring if you’re willing to change standard behaviour.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: useLaunchOptions(_:)
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Method should be called whenever app is woke up with location option.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: start()
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: General starting method for ranging and monitoring beacons. It will start ranging beacons using default regions.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: stopRangingBeacons()
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Stop ranging beacons. This is async call for Apple Location Services, you may still receive some delegate call after calling stop ranging, but with response there will be always empty array of beacons. Note that this operation can take couple of seconds.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: startMonitoringBeacons(regions:locationManager:)
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Start monitoring for beacons. By default monitoring is already on when you start ranging. Have a look at shouldMonitorForBeaconsInBackground in BeaconScanner.

Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.name: stopMonitoringBeacons()
Classes/WinguLocations.html#/s:17winguSD.abstract: Stop monitoring beacons. This is async call for Apple Location Services, you may still receive some delegate call after calling stop monitoring.

Classes/WinguLocations.html.name: WinguLocations
Classes/WinguLocations.html.abstract: Use WinguLocations to manage all triggers and locations inside wingu platform.

Classes/BeaconScanner.html.name: BeaconScanner
Classes/BeaconScanner.html.abstract: Layer of abstraction for CoreLocation ranging & monitoring iBeacons. This is build using Singleton principle. There will never be a need to use more than one instance of BeaconScanner to work with wingu beacons. By default regions to monitor and ranging are equal and default wingu regions apply if not specyfied otherwise.

Scanners.html#/c:@M@winguSDKEssential@ob.name: GeofenceScanner
Scanners.html#/c:@M@winguSDKEssential@ob.abstract: Scanner for geofences. It shared some behaviours from BeaconScanner whenever it makes sense.
